subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Scott Verplank won last Sunday for the first time in more than five years and was reminded of all the perks that come with winning. It went beyond the $1.134 million, the customized chopper and a trip to Kapalua for the winners-only Mercedes-Benz Championship.
